short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inserts a sort code held in the clipboard (paste buffer), formatting automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copy a British or Irish bank sort code into the clipboard (paste buffer) in either six digit or eight character format (eg 123456 or 12-34-56) and this extension will "paste" it into the webpage, converting the format as necessary.

Position the cursor in the sort code field (or the first of three fields), click on Sort Code Paster, and let it do the work for you.

Version History:
1.0.1)
Now works with password fields as well as text fields.
Will accept a space (and ignore it) after the sort code in the paste buffer.
